definition: to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Then I became an imaginary enemy to myself.
sentences.chinese: 于是，我成了我自己的假想敌。

sentences.english: Because the existing system is based on having an enemy.
sentences.chinese: 因为其现行制度是基于一个假想敌。

sentences.english: I'd imagine that most of you have jobs as well.
sentences.chinese: 我假想你们中的大多数也都有工作。

sentences.english: He could see where Shandy wasrunning by the path she was making through the crop, chasing imaginary rabbits."Shandy
sentences.chinese: 他看到姗蒂正穿越庄稼，追逐假想中的兔子。

sentences.english: The North Pole is the spot on Earth’s globe that marks the northern end of an imaginary stick Earth spins around.
sentences.chinese: 北极是地球表面与假想的自转轴相交的北交点。

sentences.english: The characters in this story are all fictitious.
sentences.chinese: 这个故事里的人物都是假想的。

sentences.english: On the Earth's surface where the magnetic declination is zero.
sentences.chinese: 一条在地球表面上连接磁偏为零的点的假想线。

sentences.english: The fiction of a practically exclusively American operation would be preserved as long as possible.
sentences.chinese: 实施美国单独作战之假想，务期尽可能地予以保持。

sentences.english: He tried to vision himself in a past century.
sentences.chinese: 他假想自己身处百年之前。

sentences.english: I realized then that I would have to "fake it to make it."
sentences.chinese: 我后来意识到我必须假想我一定能够实现理想。

sentences.english: The beginner must practice constantly, aiming chops and jabs at an imaginary partner.
sentences.chinese: 初学者必需坚持不懈的练习，瞄准假想对手不断猛击。

sentences.english: I'd forced myself into a bogus trade-off, of course.
sentences.chinese: 我迫使自己进入一桩假想的交易。

sentences.english: An imaginary line drawn through these two stars points to the Andromeda galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 一条假想的线贯穿这两颗星并指向仙女座星系。

sentences.english: The military industrial complex has found its replacemen¬t for the old Soviet Union.
sentences.chinese: 军工联合体找到苏联后的假想敌了。

sentences.english: Imagine the earth reduced to the size of a marble.
sentences.chinese: 假想一下地球收缩到弹球那么大。

sentences.english: But what if said software could make certain rational assumptions?
sentences.chinese: 但是如果说软件能做某种合理的假想会怎样呢？

definition: to imagine/to assume/to envisage/tentative plan/to have consideration for
because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
dummy run/to run through sth/to rehearse
to look upon as/to regard as
